import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material"; import "./post.css"; import { Users } from "../DummyData"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); const [comment, setComment] = useState(post.comment); return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date} min ago
{post?.desc}
{like} people like it
{comment} comments
); }
